subject: Procurement of ex-servicemen for fee collection from the office of Directorate General of Resettlement (DGR)
text: #TT <154 <THTf wiferorot T9 Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ma #Ra87, TT3d 4ar7 3 <roryrif 7ATI4 Ta 'Fax 9i-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QT_ Extn.: 2223 2318 2488 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 4i-5 Ta 6, Rzz-10, HTwT, *f fecrff-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/22/07-08/CMD-CO/DGR(Vol.IV) 27th August .2008 CIRCULAR NO: NHAI/COMMERCIAL OPERATIONS/ 100 This circular is issued in partial modification to our circular no_ 88 dated 15.6.2007 . Clause 17(iii) which reads As per the guidelines issued by Directorate General Resettlement, 100% of wage rate based on minimum wages of Delhi,  prescribed by Directorate General Resettlement in the areas within NCT and NCR of Delhi and 90% of it for all other states will be payable by the Authority. 75% of wage rate prescribed by DGR will be for the non-ex-servicemen deployed over & above 10% of total manpower" may be read as under:- Clause 17(iii) a) The toll plazas falling in areas within NCT and NCR of Delhi (as defined in The National Capital Region Planning Board Act, 1985 as amended from time to time:- 100% of wage rate based on minimum wages of Delhi, prescribed by DGR. b) The toll plazas falling in areas within other states & UTs:- 90% of the minimum wages prescribed by DGR, or the minimum wages prescribed by the Govt. of such State or UT whichever is higher, will be payable to the Collecting Agency. The due amount as per para (a) & (b) above will be payable by the Authority for each personnel authorized as per the contract to be employed by the Collecting Agency for the satisfactory compliance of its obligations under contract provisions. c) For the non ex-servicemen deployed over and above 10% of total manpower:" The service charges of the agency will be reduced by an amount equal to the 25 % of the entitled salary, as defined in sub-para (a) & (b), of such civilians' employees The amendment is made in consultation with a legal firm to make the clause legally sustainable "aa NHAL paid
